title: Winnie the Pooh Hundred Acre Hero
brief_description: Three stories: POOH OUGHTA BE IN PICTURES , Christopher Robin makes his own movie. TRAP AS TRAP CAN, Pooh and Piglet help Heffalump Jnr to learn bout TNT. HONEY FOR A BUNNY, Rabbit trades with Pooh - but first he has to get honey - and escape bees.
